> infinitetux.desktop CC0 GPL-3.0+ infinitetux 2D platformer game inspired by Infinite Mario
Infinite Tux is a 2D platformer game inspired by Infinite Mario. The game is procedurally generated every time it is replayed, so you always play a different game.
You can break blocks, run fast, collect coins and get one-ups. Run through the levels stepping on enemies and spitting colorful spit balls to kill them. Carry de-hatched chick eggs and launch them towards other enemies to kill them too!
Infinite Tux recreates the feel of those fun 1980's platformer games that kept people sitting in front of their CRT television sets for hours on end. Have fun and enjoy this 8 bit retro style game!
